title: Add Comment Types to Shared
description: Extend the shared types to include a Comment type for task comments.
instructions: Create a new file packages/shared/src/types/comment.ts with Comment, CommentWithAuthor types and validation schemas. Export from index.ts.

hints.text: Create Comment interface with id, content, userId, taskId, timestamps
CommentWithAuthor should extend Comment and add an author object

commonMistakes.consequence: Duplicate fields and harder to maintain
commonMistakes.correction: Use extends keyword: interface CommentWithAuthor extends Comment
